title: Most hashtagged cities on Instagram worldwide 2017
yAxis: Number of hashtagged posts in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing State in the x axis and Number of hashtagged posts in millions in the y axis.
State London has the highest Number of hashtagged posts in millions and Bangkok has the lowest Number of hashtagged posts in millions.
There is a difference of 71.12 between the maximum State London and minimum State Bangkok.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number of hashtagged posts in millions in each State on the y axis.
The Number of hashtagged posts in millions is highest at State London and lowest at State Bangkok.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing State in the x axis and Number of hashtagged posts in millions in the y axis.
State London has the highest Number of hashtagged posts in millions and Bangkok has the lowest Number of hashtagged posts in millions.
There is a difference of 71.12 between the maximum State London and minimum State Bangkok.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number of hashtagged posts in millions in each State on the y axis.
The Number of hashtagged posts in millions is appeared to be the highest at State London and lowest at State Bangkok.
There is a difference of 71.12 between the maximum State London and minimum State Bangkok.
The State London has the highest Number of hashtagged posts in millions, followed by New York, and Paris. Down to the State Bangkok which is the lowest.
The lowest value 17.66 at Bangkok is almost 2.31 times smaller than the average value 38.42.
